name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Talented Senior Frontend Engineer with 13+ years of extensive experience in developing high-performance applications tailored for the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **React**, **Next.js**, **JavaScript**, and **TypeScript**, with a strong emphasis on creating responsive UIs and implementing accessibility and usability principles. Skilled in integrating and utilizing APIs, ensuring efficient communication and data flow. Highly adept at debugging and employing tools like **Postman** to streamline development processes.

Possessing a pragmatic mindset and strong attention to design details, I excel in product thinking, ensuring user satisfaction while maintaining technical excellence. Driven by curiosity and autonomy, I actively seek innovative solutions and improvements. Additionally, I have demonstrated hands-on expertise in backend development using **Node.js**, and have experience with cloud services such as **AWS** and **Azure**.
